hero.subtitle: Explore the latest YouTube videos from your favorite channels. Stay updated with trending content and discover new creators.

home.title: YouTube Player - Discover Amazing Videos
home.description: Discover and explore amazing YouTube videos organized by categories. Watch trending content, top channels, and new videos all in one place.
home.ogDescription: Discover and explore amazing YouTube videos organized by categories. Watch trending content, top channels, and new videos all in one place.

categories.title: Categories - YouTube Player
categories.ogDescription: Explore videos organized by category. Discover content from gaming, music, technology, and more.

topChannels.title: Top Channels - YouTube Player
topChannels.description: Discover the most popular YouTube channels by subscriber count and total views
topChannels.ogDescription: Discover the most popular YouTube channels by subscriber count and total views

topVideos.title: Top Videos - YouTube Player
topVideos.description: Discover the most popular YouTube videos by view count and trending content
topVideos.ogDescription: Discover the most popular YouTube videos by view count and trending content
